string.text: Hidden Threat: The Beginning
Find the 'black cat' in the 'dark room'. Ask Colonel Kuznetsov for more detail.
Hidden Threat: Surviving Stalker
Check what happened to the stalkers in Darkscape.\n At the farm in Cordon, talk to the Sawmill survivor while using a disguise.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
Something went wrong and the stalker is dead. Inform Kuznetsov of the failure.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Sawmill in the Darkscape
Look around the Sawmill for any useful information on what happened here in the recent past.
Hidden Threat: Examine the Sawmill Building
Look around the Sawmill for any useful information on what happened here in the recent past.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
Return to the commander with a report.
Hidden Threat: Disable Brain Scorcher
Disable to Brain Scorcher. Talk to Sakharov.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
The "Brain Scorcher is disabled. I must report this to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Jupiter Plant
Get to the Jupiter Plant and provide fire support.
Hidden Threat: Inspect Jupiter Plant Production Facilities
Go further into the production facilities.
Hidden Threat: Examine Bodies of the Attackers
Examine the bodies and collect one of the chevrons with symbols.\n I should collect at least one.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Kuznetsov
Ask Colonel Kuznetsov about the patches with unknown symbols.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
Find out what Lieutenant Kirillov wants.
Hidden Threat: Deliver the Radio
Deliver the radio to the military units guarding the entrance to "X-18" in the Dark Valley.
Hidden Threat: Repel the ISG Attack
Organize a defense and repel the ISG attack.
Hidden Threat: Examine the Attackers
Examine the attackers for useful information.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
A locked PDA was found on one of the ISG mercenaries. Return to Lieutenant Kirillov.
Hidden Threat: Wait for Kirillov to Unlock the PDA
Wait a day or two for Kirillov to unlock the PDA.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
Kirillov has unlocked the PDA. Report back to him.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Kuznetsov
A marked map of the Jupiter Plant over X-18 and targets of ISG were found on the PDA. Report this to Kuznetsov.
Hidden Threat: Meet Sergeant Gorobetz
Meet Sergeant Gorobetz at the Hospital in the outskirts of Pripyat.
Hidden Threat: The Mouse in the Mousetrap
Hidden Threat: Destroy ISG Sniper
Find and kill the sniper before they eliminate Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Provide Fire Support to the SSU Detachment
Rush to the aid of the SSU detachment led by Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Degtyarev
The ISG group has been eliminated. Speak with the Colonel.
Hidden Threat: Find the Case in the Department Store
Retrieve a briefcase left by an SSU agent from the department store.
Hidden Threat: Take the Case to the Agroprom
Deliver the case to Degtyarev at the Agroprom military base.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Degtyarev
Speak with Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Place the Recorder
Place the recorder in a house that stands alone in the south-west of Dead City.
Hidden Threat: Wait 2 Days
The recorder has been placed. Pick it up in two days.
Hidden Threat: Pick up the Bookmark from Dead City
Two days have passed. Pick up the recorder and deliver it to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Return to Degtyarev
Take the recorder to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Talk to the Squad Leader at CNPP
Meet the support squad at the arranged location and keep the ISG out of the Sarcophagus.
Hidden Threat: Go to the Northwest of CNPP
The squad leader fears one of his scouts has been found and killed. Check the road from the Hospital.
Hidden Threat: Eliminate the ISG Team
Eliminate the ISG team.
Hidden Threat: Report Success to Degtyarev
Report to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Report to Colonel Kuznetsov
Report to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Major Vereshchagin
Speak with Major Vereshchagin.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Entrance of the Pripyat Underground
Meet the assault squad at the Jupiter-side entrance to the Pripyat Underground.
Hidden Threat: Enter the Pripyat Underground
Enter the Pripyat underground.
Hidden Threat: Eliminate ISG Presence in the Pripyat Underground
Eliminate the ISG presence from the Pripyat underground.
Hidden Threat: Report Success to Major Vereshchagin
Report the success to Major Vereshchagin.
[HT]Southern Checkpoint: Hand Over Documents
Give the accounting reports to Major Zhurov, at the Southern roadblock in Cordon.
[HT]Agroprom: Find Courier
Find the lost courier somewhere on the road to the base from the dump.
[HT]Agroprom: Return Package to Lozhkin
Find the lost courier somewhere on the road to the base from the dump.
%s, your presence is required at the base. There is an urgent assignment.

Mil-stalker, our case is still at a dead end, but there's a difficult assignment ahead of you. Our northern operations are severely hampered by the Brain Scorcher. Talk to Sakharov in Yantar and find a way to disable it.
Mil-stalker, come see me. I need to talk to you.
%s, come in for a minute, we need to talk.
%s, about your PDA. Come on over, we have something to talk about.

Hey %s, long time no see. I spotted a group of ISG. I can't do this alone and I need your help. Do you have the guts to go to the hospital in the outskirts of Pripyat? If so, you'll maybe even earn some new stripes from the bosses.
Mil-stalker %s, orders are to arrive at the base and report straight to me.
Mil-stalker %s, orders are to report to me immediately.
Received:
%s: free stalkers - 2 hours
Armistice
%s asked for you. We opened a free pass to our bases for 2 hours. Let's not do anything stupid if you want to live. Our boys... they don't like warriors very much.
The %s truce is over.
Received:
New PDA entry: A note from Sgt. Lozhkin
Military
I see the enemy! To battle!
Place of interest
